summary: Hello Kitty re-texture for the Triss armor.  Colorful and cute!  Haha.  ~_~
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]Notice:[/color] I removed the Hello Kitty face from the armor. I spoke with staff and I can't use it without permission from Sanrio. So now it's just what you see in the images, minus the kitty.

I also made [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5989]Cute and Colorful armor[/url] if you are interested.

This is a re-texture for the Triss Armor. You will have to download that first and apply my texture to be able to use it. :) There are many places to get the Triss Armor, but these are the best ones to get, I think.

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4708]Triss Armor[/url] by Psyke23.
-or-
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5135]Triss Armor[/url] by Fraper.

I hope at least one person out there enjoys this! :) I tried to make it look the best I could, but keep in mind that this is my first armor texture.

[color=green]Credits go to:[/color]
CD Projekt - For the Witcher 2 and Triss Armor.
Fraper - Uploaded the original textures that I used in this mod.
author: IcePenguin
